excerpt: "Every single digitally adept enterprise has the potential to enhance operations with the correct implementation of artificial intelligence technologies. I use the word correct because there is a significant difference between utilizing AI for its own sake versus properly embedding the technology in order to fulfill a specific set of firm objectives."
